name: sampleCodeForCI
description: This is a sample code which is used for the testing of Go Continous Integration tool

scripts.unit_test: node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register -r should -r simock -R spec test/unit_test
scripts.xunit_test: XUNIT_FILE=build/xunit.xml node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register  -r should -r simock -R xunit-file test/unit_test
scripts.code_coverage: XUNIT_HTML_COV_CONFIG=../../../config/xunit_html_cov.json node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register -r should -r simock -r test/register-handlers.coffee -R xunit-html-cov test/unit_test

author: Raghavendra Karunanidhi <raghu.k@openly.co>
